citances.sentence:
In Shen v Minister for Immigration [2006] FCA 408 Marshall J distinguished the decision in Morsed :
"[36] In Morsed , the appellant claimed that his breach of condition 8202 was due to exceptional circumstances beyond his control.

Reference was made to Shen v Minister for Immigration, Multicultural and Indigenous Affairs [2006] FCA 408 at [33-34] per Marshall J as follows:-
"33 Consequently there was nothing stopping the Tribunal from relying on grounds other than the attendance record ground.
